welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sharon, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at T. F. Green Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
